tha-ap82:5.4: padmapupphāni → tīṇi pupphāni (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | padumapupphāni (sya1ed, sya2ed)
tha-ap82:22.3: Tepi padmā → te visuddhā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap82:24.4: nibbānaṃ → nibbāṇaṃ (bj), pāpuṇissati → phassayissati (bj) | passayissati (pts-vp-pli1ed, mr)
tha-ap82:25.4: anubhosiṃ tisampadā → anubhosiṃ tisampadaṃ (bj) | anubhosin ti sampadā (pts-vp-pli1ed) | anubhūyanti sampadā (mr)
